replies.body: I loved the Whoosh bang high fiving at the end :P
Made me think of Bill Nye, tbh. Haha
lol same here
it helped me feel completed.
Trinimmortal!? Featured on all chat!!!??? AGHHHHHHHHHHHH TRIN YOU'RE ABOUT TO GET FAMOUS. YAY.
Anyone else notice that in that last piece of art Jinx has on Caits hat?
She also has Ashe's bow, Zigg's Bomb, Ekko's Bat, Gnar's weapons, Kennen's Shuriken and a staff that I can't figure out who it belongs to. Oh looks like an Elise spider too.
I was wondering if anyone else saw that.
you guys are great love seeing the light you bring to this but i still miss Nikasaur
I feel like they don't know how big Malphite is.  Anyone else? Just me?
They did not mention Malphite. You mean Nautilus or did you just bring up Malphite just because?

I meant Malphite because they mentioned how Naut is a very different size on the rift and Malpite is a literal mountain.  Clearly they weren't considering size changes because Malphite and Cho are vastly larger than the whole rift itself.  According to the log in art Dark Star Thresh is too.

Actually, you can see Malphite's literal size in his splash art and in the "Art of League" book. While Cho'Gath and Malphite are some of the larger champs lore-wise, it has never really been stated officially that Cho'Gath or Malphite are THAT big. The only champ that could possibly be as big as Summoner's Rift would be Aurelion Sol, length-wise at the least, if you take a comparison of him and the structure in his splash.
Yeah, and Malphite in the art is the size of a small mountain.  Cho is of a slightly smaller size but we know that he grows as he feasts, so he could very well get bigger than that.

I suppose that is quite possible. Man, I really want to see them in a story or a cinematic. They are some of the OG champions and they don't get too much attention now, plus both of their lore are outdated.

Yeah hopefully we can see some short stories for a lot of the stand alone champs since it is hard to do large projects for champs that don't have much connection to other champions.  The Void isn't really a good group to do a story on and a bunch of champs like Malphite just don't have many connections or reasons to be in other champ's stories.

Heck, from his lore for all we know Malphite has never left the rift in his whole time in runeterra.
